metadata.Title: CVE-2020-9794 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking. This issue is fixed in iOS 13.5 and iPadOS 13.5, macOS Catalina 10.15.5, tvOS 13.4.5, watchOS 6.2.5, iTunes 12.10.7 for Windows, iCloud for Windows 11.2, iCloud for Windows 7.19. A malicious application may cause a denial of service or potentially disclose memory contents.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This may be an Apple-specific CVE, as of 2022-09-14, no details are available as to what the vulnerability is. Marking Ubuntu as not-affected.

criterions.comment: sqlite: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
sqlite3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
